thread.title: Lad thinks he’s got lucky after texting a girl… before making this one fatal error
thread.title_full: Lad thinks he’s got lucky after texting a girl… before making this one fatal error

author: sroberts
title: Lad thinks he’s got lucky after texting a girl… before making this one fatal error
text:
Comments A MAN thought he’d secured a night of passion with a girl he fancied at university. 
Sadly, his attempts to woo her soon unravelled in seconds when he sent her a VERY unfortunate message. Twitter 2 It could be easy to mistake this messages as innocent enough 
The text exchange started off innocent enough, when the student asked his pal what she was up to. 
She swiftly responded that she was “eating chips”, before asking: “why what u want?” 
Believing he’d found the key to the woman’s heart, the lothario texted her: “Can I come over? 
“I’ll bring u chocolate.” 
His gesture seems to have gone down a treat, as his classmate happily agreed. 
But it didn’t take long for the blundering bloke to put his foot in it. Twitter 2 The man unwittingly revealed his real intentions when he texted the wrong number 
He was so chuffed that the girl accepted his request, that he tried to text a mate to share the good news. 
The cocky Casanova crudely remarked that he was “Bout to get BALLS DEEP BRO”… but failed to check who he was sending the message to. 
Embarrassingly, he actually ended up texting the girl he was trying to seduce. 
After a brief moment of confusion, the unimpressed lass responded: “Don’t come over”. 
She was so horrified by the lack of tact that she took to Twitter to share a screenshot of the excruciating exchange. 
— tired girl (@killermarecat) February 20, 2017 
In just three days, the post has racked up over 25,000 retweets and 95,000 likes. 
Many were NOT impressed by the man’s terrible chat-up attempt. 
One remarked: “That guy is a bum lmao. I know so many people like him. Idiots.” 
Another said: “Sounds like he didn’t care about how you were feeling and was just tryna take advantage #DontLieAboutChocolate.” Related Stories 'I'm practising your sex tape' From unexpected overshares to hilarious autocorrect fails, these are the funniest text messages sent by grandparents Snap it! From laundry bursting into flames to sexy plans which didn’t quite work out… people are sharing their hilarious life fails on Snapchat DISASTER CHEF The hilarious cooking fails that will make you feel better about your own kitchen mishaps INSTANT FAIL Learner fails his driving test in just FIVE SECONDS by immediately driving out of exam centre on to the wrong side of the road THE FONT OF ALL WISDOM? Hilarious typeface fails make written words seem MUCH ruder than they really are 
It’s not the first time a singleton’s text message advances have been awkwardly spurned in recent months.
